title: David Returns to Jerusalem
summary: Joab rebukes David for mourning too publicly. David returns to power, showing mercy to Shimei, Mephibosheth, and others. However, tension arises between the tribes of Judah and Israel.

faq.question: Why did Joab confront David?
faq.answer: Because David’s grief demoralized the army that had just saved him.

faq.question: What was David’s attitude toward his former enemies?
faq.answer: He showed mercy and forgiveness, reuniting the kingdom peacefully.
